price: 11. (Waa) uumaha samooyinka iyo arlada wuxuu idiinka yeelay nafahiinna noocyo (lab iyo dheddig); xoolahana (sidoo kale) noocyo. Sidaasuu idinku tarmiyaa. Ma jiro wax la mid ah7, waana Isaga wax kasta Maqlaha, wax kasta Arka.
arabic: فَاطِرُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنۡ أَنفُسِكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا وَمِنَ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ أَزۡوَٰجٗا يَذۡرَؤُكُمۡ فِيهِۚ لَيۡسَ كَمِثۡلِهِۦ شَيۡءٞۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡبَصِيرُ
footnotes: 7. Ma jiro wax isu ekaansho ah haba yaraatee ee ka dhexeeya Abuuraha iyo uunkiisa xag jiritaan, tilmaamo iyo camallo ahaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fāṭiru al-samāwāti wal-arḍi jaʿala lakum min anfusikum azwājan wamina al-anʿāmi azwājan yadhra-ukum fīhi laysa kamith'lihi shayon wahuwa al-samīʿu al-baṣīru
